PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Interface ("we", "our") respects your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website and free website order service.
PrivacyPolicy.section1Body: When you request a free website or contact us, we may collect your name, email, phone number, company name, and design preferences. We use this only to deliver the service and communicate with you.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Body: We use your information to build your website, send verification codes, and follow up on your order. We do not sell or share your data with third parties for marketing.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Body: We use cookies for language preference (e.g. en/mn) and to keep your session when verifying your email for an order. You can clear cookies in your browser at any time.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Body: For privacy questions, contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or Viber. We are based in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: By using Interface's website and free website offer, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
TermsOfService.section1Body: We offer one free website per qualifying business, as described on our site. We reserve the right to refuse or limit the offer. The website remains our template/work until delivered; after delivery, you receive the agreed output.
TermsOfService.section2Body: You must provide accurate contact and business information and be available for a short call if we need to clarify requirements. You may not use the service for illegal or misleading purposes.
TermsOfService.section3Body: The free website is provided "as is." We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability or specific business results. We may update or discontinue the offer with reasonable notice.
TermsOfService.section4Body: For questions about these terms, contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or Viber. Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
